attributes.action: Reinstate the QEII as a national treasure to be berthed, at a suitable location, for the pleasure of all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dubai World, the state-backed conglomerate, plan to sell the QE2 from Cunard to offset it's debts. This magnificent vessel should never have been sold initially but, for legitimate reasons, was sold to become a floating hotel. These plans never came to fruition and now is a good, and financially viable, time to re-patriate this British treasure where she belongs. Many of our nautical treasures have been sold to other nations or scrapped, leaving us with a big gap in our seafaring history. RMS Queen Mary, languishing at Long Beach, U.S.A. The Queen Elizabeth, crapped in Hong Kong 1975. Let us preserve something of our merchant heritage, before it all disappears into investors' hands. Remember the complete farce of Concorde? Do not let this happen again...
